Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Breakfast buffet was very early and picked over if we did not show up early enough Cleaning staff looked angry all the time We recommend paying extra for in room breakfast that was amazing instead
Positive_Review: Location toiletries and bed were great Breakfast to room was great Desk let us check in early and was very pleasant

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: The rooms are very small very typical of rooms around Paris we found But the shower was smaller than what we expected It was a struggle to get in and out The key that was provided to us was also difficult to maneuver
Positive_Review: The staff at this little hotel are wonderful They were probably the nicest people we met in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Bathroom door was missing parit of the handle and we had to stick our finger down into a hole to get leverage to pull the door open
Positive_Review: It was within walking distance of Paris attractions

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: The breakfast was a bit spare and too expensive at 14 euros a setting
Positive_Review: We did need a room upgrade the one we reserved was way too small and might be more accurately advertised on the site but once we did we had a spacious lovely room with a comfortable bed The staff was exceptionally helpful and the location truly can t be beat

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: The only thing I wasn t 100 sold on at the front desk they offer tickets to popular attractions so that you don t have to wait in the ticket queues However these tickets don t get you out of the security queues we waited close to two hours to get into the Musee d Orsay Do you research it may be possible to skip those queues as well if you book through a tour company we didn t explore that option but it may have saved us some time that s not the hotel s fault though just a note
Positive_Review: The lobby and common areas were in a word charming Comfortable full of character expertly decorated Our room was also beautiful and the lighting was excellent although it was on the small side not unexpected as we booked an economy double Just be informed The bathroom was sized proportionally to the room fine for us but I can see how this might be a problem for any travelers with mobility issues again not unexpected just be informed The bed was very comfortable and the linens were of very nice quality Overall the hotel was very peaceful and relaxing The location could not have been better it was close to public transit and within walking distance of restaurants attractions shops etc but did not feel overly touristy

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Can t think of anything negative
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfortable Updated facility still maintaining the old world Parisian charm Excellent location with many shops cafes and bakeries all within walking distance Would definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Positive_Review: The location is perfect and the refurbished hotel is now even better Such a romantic and relaxing atmosphere the staff could not have been more helpful and friendly The room was finished to a very high standard with so much attention to detail Would thoroughly recommend for the best Paris break

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Commode and sink area were rather tight but shower was very large
Positive_Review: The location was excellent for our three night stay We could walk to a convenient bus or metro stop within minutes The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and provided suggestions on restaurants and tours and shopping Typical boutique style and size of bedrooms Family of four including 11 and 15 yr old girls were accommodated comfortably in a top floor room when rollaway was added Beds were comfortable Did not do breakfast so cannot comment Would return to this property if my travels take me once again to Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Our room was up in the eaves and we could not comfortably sit up in bed to read We love the area but it is very noisy at night
Positive_Review: The shower was excellent and so was the room service breakfast each day The lighting in the room was very good indeed we could see to read at night unlike at many hotels

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Positive_Review: pleasant and helpful staff excellent location lovely decor in an old and well maintained building in the heart of Paris would definitely recommend

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Positive_Review: Excellent location we walked pretty much everywhere The rooms are beautiful the bed is good and also the bathroom is very clean lovely hotel i recommend it

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: If the rooms were larger a pair of comfortable armchairs
Positive_Review: Very good position near the Sorbonne with plenty of restaurants and bars nearby Very well run friendly staff We have stayed there three times now and would be happy to return Nice toiletries Very clean

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Positive_Review: The whole experience was perfect high lighted by the personalities and professionalism of the staff led by Valerie and Olivier The only thing they couldn t control was the weather But even the conditions were brightened by their smiles and helpfulness

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Nothing really maybe a bit more space in the room but better than many hotels in Paris
Positive_Review: Lovely room great bathroom very comfortable very nice service great location We loved it

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: I prefer hotels with a breakfast included
Positive_Review: Very helpful friendly staff Excellent location Quiet and comfortable rooms Would definitely stay there again

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: when we arrived it was late and the night manager gave us a very small room on the upper floor with very low cieling the heating was not working at all but on the next day we changed it to much better one Breakfast has very limited choice and doest worth 15
Positive_Review: The perfect location cozy room very quite street and bed was amazing i slept as a baby Great place to stay in the city center and just enjoy walking very easy to get from and to the airport the Luxemburg railway station was just 5 7 min walk

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Positive_Review: Location is excellent and staff was very helpful Rooms were comfortable and well appointed and large enough by European standards I would stay there again when in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: The shower room was a little small and the tub was very high climb into no grab bars
Positive_Review: The staff was helpful kind and happy to see us The room was comfortable and brightly decorated Loved to breakfast room service of coffee bread rolls croisants at 8 euros Perfect location for left bank close to Metro

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Perhaps the 4 stars is a bit optimistic
Positive_Review: Very good experience Service was great Reservation with two kids wasn t clear Valerie solved it by offering two adjacent rooms without any extra charge

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: Perhaps a soup on more gentillesse front desk But here I quibble
Positive_Review: Decor was charming and the breakfasts excellent Best of three similar hotels in France

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Negative_Review: There is nothing not to like
Positive_Review: This little hotel is a class act The staff are lovely friendly professional and extremely helpful Location is terrific in a quiet part of the Latin Quarter Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: H tel Saint Paul Rive Gauche
Positive_Review: Fantastic location Staff were wonderful fa

Positive_Review: Location was great close to good shops and restaurants

Positive_Review: Catherine and team were great hosts The location of this hotel is perfect to access the delights of Paris

Positive_Review: Cozy hotel in the best area of Paris room small but very comfortable clean and with a good atmosphere
